summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of $17.20 from Local Improvement District Fund No. 1007 to be paid S. T. Begent by reason of double assessment against certain property in the laying of water mains in Phinney Avenue, et al, under Ordinance No. 11871, and appropriating money from the water fund to make up deficiency caused by the payment of said sum to the said S. T. Begent.
